executable.title: NJet Linear Discriminant Analysis (TubeTK)
executable.description: Given an image and foreground and background masks, computes multiscale Jet (0, 1, and 2 order) features at each pixel, performs a multivariate LDA or PCA for separating the classes, and generates the LDA/PCA instances of the images.

image.name: labelmap
image.label: Label map
image.description: Labelmap that designates the object of interest and "other"

parameters.label: LDA Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters that determine how the LDA is generated

double-vector.name: ridgeScales
double-vector.description: Scales at which Ridge features are computed
double-vector.label: Ridge scales

integer.name: objectId
integer.description: Id to be used in labelmap
integer.label: Id of vessels in the labelmap

file.name: saveVesselSeedInfo
file.description: Save vessel seed info to a file
file.label: Save vessel seed Info

file.name: loadVesselSeedInfo
file.description: Load vessel seed info from a file
file.label: Load vessel seed Info

string.name: saveFeatureImages
string.description: Base filename for saving feature images
string.label: Feature images base filename
